page-experience.title: Experience
page-experience.description: A timeline of my professional journey and key achievements in the tech industry.

page-about.description1: Admitted to the Bachelor 3 Computer Science program at Ynov, I am building my expertise with the goal of achieving an Expert title (Master's level). Passionate about the Fullstack ecosystem, I currently combine the fundamentals of my DWWM certification with a modern and innovative vision of web development.
page-about.description2: Specializing in the React, TypeScript, and Node.js ecosystem, I master the entire application lifecycle. My experience at StoryCom enabled me to lead projects from start to finish: from UI/UX design to secure REST API architecture, including database management and cloud deployment (Vercel, Render), orchestrated through rigorous Agile methodologies.
page-about.description3: Currently seeking a work-study position for 2026/2027 (1 week training / 3 weeks in company), I am ready for a long-term commitment. My autonomy, responsiveness, and drive for challenges are my key assets to actively contribute to your digital projects' success.

timeline.title: Apprenticeship Search (Bachelor)
timeline.description: Admitted to higher education, I am looking for a work-study program to consolidate my skills and specialize. Passionate and operational, I wish to invest myself in concrete projects.
achievements: Rhythm: 1 week training / 3 weeks in company
Goal: Leverage my skills within a company

timeline.title: Web and Mobile Web Developer
timeline.description: Level 5 certification training focused on comprehensive web and mobile application development. Mastery of the software lifecycle, from front-end to back-end, including databases and deployment.

timeline.title: Specialized Programming Modules
timeline.description: Intensive training focused on creating modern and responsive user interfaces. In-depth learning of the JavaScript ecosystem, accessibility, and web integration best practices.

timeline.title: Preparatory Classes (CPGE)
timeline.description: Two-year intensive scientific curriculum preparing for French Engineering Schools. Rigorous training in mathematics, physics, and engineering sciences, developing high analytical and abstraction capabilities.
achievements: Mastery of Technical Norms and Standards
